# jsonclasses-flask
JSONClasses integration with Flask.

## Prerequisites

To use this package, you should have `jsonclasses` and `flask[async]` installed.

## Installation

Install `jsonclasses-flask` with `pip`.

```sh
pip install jsonclasses-flask
```
